Bungeni Technical Documentation.

The Bungeni Technical Documentation has been compiled to provide both novice and expert Plone (python) developers with a resource that will help them run the Bungeni portal easily. This documentation also includes best practices for installation, customization, configuration and usage of Bungeni.

Feedback

Feedback is greatly appreciated. If you have any questions, comments, random praise, or anonymous threats, send me an email.
